entry.value: SELECT CONCURSO_NOMBRE, CAST(META AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS META, CAST(PRODUCCION AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS PRODUCCION, CAST(RECAUDO AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS RECAUDO, CAST(PORC_PRODUCCION AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS PORC_PRODUCCION, CAST(PORC_RECAUDO AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS PORC_RECAUDO FROM BDG.EXT_CONCURSO_PLAN_INC WHERE NIT_AGENTE =:NITAGENTE
